programme.title: DTM 2024
programme.desc: Το Γερμανικό Πρωτάθλημα Τουρισμού φιλοξενεί τροποποιημένα αυτοκίνητα που κυκλοφορούν στον δρόμο, αποτελείται από 16 αγώνες σε 8 αγωνιστικά διήμερα. Η διοργάνωση έχει ως βάση της τη Γερμανία, με γύρους να διεξάγονται και σε άλλα μέρη της Ευρώπης. Περιγραφή: Χρήστος Κυριαζής.

programme.title: Mingle All the Way
programme.desc: A young entrepreneur is trying to win over investors for the dating app she has developed. To help bring on investors for expansion, she promises to take part in using it in the coming weeks before Christmas to find love and track her progress.

programme.title: The Nine Lives of Christmas
programme.desc: As the Christmas holiday draws near, a veterinary student (Kimberly Sustad) and a stray cat challenge a fireman's (Brandon Routh) commitment to life as a bachelor.

programme.title: Christmas With the Darlings
programme.desc: When an assistant gives her final notice, she is drawn into helping the younger brother of her boss as he looks after his orphaned nieces and nephew through Christmas.

programme.title: Catch Me if You Claus
programme.desc: Avery Quinn's shot at anchoring news clashes with a Santa-suited intruder, Chris, who insists he's Santa's son on a first Christmas mission. They unravel a career-making story together.

programme.title: The 5-Year Christmas Party
programme.desc: Told over the course of five years, two recent college grads find themselves drawn together year after year while working for a catering company that specializes in holiday parties.

programme.title: Trivia at St. Nick's
programme.desc: Locals compete in a Christmas bar trivia tournament at the end of the semester.

programme.title: Our Holiday Story
programme.desc: A loving couple shares the story of how they met and fell in love when their daughter's boyfriend comes to meet them for the first time at Christmas.

programme.title: Our Holiday Story
programme.desc: A loving couple shares the story of how they met and fell in love when their daughter's boyfriend comes to meet them for the first time at Christmas.

programme.title: Crown for Christmas
programme.desc: After getting fired from her job as a maid at a ritzy New York City hotel, a woman accepts a temporary job as governess to a young girl who is part of a powerful European family.

programme.title: If I Only Had Christmas
programme.desc: A cheerful publicist teams up with a cynical business owner to help a charity in need at Christmastime.

programme.title: A Kiss Before Christmas
programme.desc: Ethan, always the nice guy, wakes up to a new reality at Christmastime. He's initially enthralled with his new life but soon realizes it's not what he thought it would be.

programme.title: A Magical Christmas Village
programme.desc: A woman tells her young granddaughter, Chloe, that her miniature Christmas village can magically grant holiday wishes. As Chloe begins setting up the figurines, real-life events seem to mimic the scenes she creates.

programme.title: Christmas by Starlight
programme.desc: A lawyer makes a deal with the heir to a development firm to spare her family's restaurant from demolition. However, she must spend the week posing as the legal counsel his father is demanding he hire in the wake of some costly mistakes.

programme.title: Christmas at the Plaza
programme.desc: When historian Jessica is hired to create the Plaza's Christmas display, she finds more than facts while teaming up with handsome decorator Nick to bring the display to life.

programme.title: Checkin' It Twice
programme.desc: Sparks fly between a hockey player and a real estate agent after he moves into a cottage in her family's backyard.

programme.title: Holiday Crashers
programme.desc: Best friends Toni and Bri have worked at the same card shop for more years than they should as both struggle to find their true life's path. Toni and Bri decide to create new identities to crash the Christmas parties.

programme.title: One Royal Holiday
programme.desc: When Anna offers a stranded mother and son shelter from a blizzard, she learns that they are the royal family of Galwick and that they are both in need of a little Christmas magic.

programme.title: Trivia at St. Nick's
programme.desc: Locals compete in a Christmas bar trivia tournament at the end of the semester.

programme.title: Santa Tell Me
programme.desc: A design show host finds a letter from Santa promising to meet her true love, a man named Nick, by Christmas Eve. Meeting three Nicks complicates her search.

programme.title: Mystery on Mistletoe Lane
programme.desc: New to town, Heidi Wicks and her kids discover a Christmas mystery in their historic home. Local handyman and historian David helps along the way, finding his own surprising connection.

programme.title: Five Gold Rings
programme.desc: An artist returns home for the holidays and gets tasked with a Christmas quest left by her grandmother. She and the local PI must return lost items to their owners before Christmas.

programme.title: My Sweet Austrian Holiday
programme.desc: Charlotte inherits a chocolate shop from her grandparents but soon finds herself in a battle with a large developer who wants to buy the building to turn it into an exclusive shopping boutique.

programme.title: My Sweet Austrian Holiday
programme.desc: Charlotte inherits a chocolate shop from her grandparents but soon finds herself in a battle with a large developer who wants to buy the building to turn it into an exclusive shopping boutique.

programme.title: Five More Minutes: Moments Like These
programme.desc: Returning to her old home for the holidays, a young widow's Christmas wish for her son gets answered in unexpected ways.

programme.title: Christmas at Cartwright's
programme.desc: An angel delivers good fortune and the possibility of holiday romance to a struggling single mother who takes a job as a department store Santa Claus.

programme.title: Sharing Christmas
programme.desc: A real estate developer is given the opportunity to transform an old shopping complex into a prime location. Unfortunately, there is one tenant who is holding out -- the Christmas shop owner he met just days ago.

programme.title: Our Italian Christmas Memories
programme.desc: As their grandfather struggles with dementia, the Colucci siblings set out to re-create their late grandmother's legendary pasta sauce to help jog his memory.

programme.title: A Cookie Cutter Christmas
programme.desc: Two schoolteachers take their rivalry to a new level while they scramble to win a holiday baking contest and the affections of a handsome single father.

programme.title: The Christmas Club
programme.desc: Two busy strangers meet when they help an elderly woman find her lost Christmas savings. Thanks to fate and Christmas magic, they also find something they were both missing: true love.

programme.title: A December Bride
programme.desc: Layla accompanies Seth to her cousin's wedding, and everyone is surprised when she announces they're engaged. They are forced to keep up the pretense, and as they spend more time together, they find themselves feeling something very real.

programme.title: Love You Like Christmas
programme.desc: A high-powered executive reconsiders her priorities when car trouble leads her to Christmas Valley, a town in love with Christmas.

programme.title: Romance at Reindeer Lodge
programme.desc: Molly and Jared have both sworn off holiday events. When they find themselves stuck at a Christmas-themed ranch, they have no choice but to allow their cynical hearts to melt.

programme.title: A Glenbrooke Christmas
programme.desc: As Christmas nears, heiress Jessica Morgan seizes what seems like her last chance to experience a relaxed Christmas and heads off to the small town of Glenbrooke, where she meets a handsome fireman.

programme.title: This Time Each Year
programme.desc: Despite a trial separation, Lauren pretends to still be with her husband, Kevin, to placate her overbearing mother. The ruse may be just what the couple needs to finally work on their marriage.

programme.title: A Timeless Christmas
programme.desc: A man travels from 1903 to 2020, where he meets a tour guide at his historic mansion and gets to experience a 21st century Christmas.

programme.title: My Christmas Guide
programme.desc: After losing his eyesight, a college professor adopts a seeing-eye dog from a guide dog trainer. As they all spend time together, his confidence returns and his heart begins to open.

programme.title: A Godwink Christmas
programme.desc: As Christmas approaches, Paula reluctantly accepts a marriage proposal from her boyfriend. When her Aunt Jane invites Paula to her Nantucket home, she bonds with a charming inn owner.

programme.title: One December Night
programme.desc: Two music managers must put their history aside to oversee the televised reunion performance of their rock star fathers with a fractured past.

programme.title: Northpole: Open for Christmas
programme.desc: During Christmastime a handyman and an elf persuade a businesswoman to keep the inn that she inherited from her aunt.

programme.title: Ms. Christmas Comes to Town
programme.desc: After receiving a terminal diagnosis, a shopping channel host known as Ms. Christmas embarks on a multi-city excursion to spread holiday cheer before her farewell broadcast.

programme.title: My Christmas Dream
programme.desc: A department store manager sets out to create an amazing holiday display window to impress the owner. She asks a recently-fired employee to help her make the display, and as they work together, they start to fall in love.

programme.title: Long Lost Christmas
programme.desc: Hayley is an interior designer who plans to surprise her recently widowed mother with the perfect holiday present -- the extended family she knows her mom yearns for.

programme.title: A Dream of Christmas
programme.desc: An ambitious married woman gets more than she bargained for when her wish to be single again is granted. She awakens to discover she's got everything she's ever wanted, except her husband. She resolves to find him a second time.

programme.title: My Sweet Austrian Holiday
programme.desc: Charlotte inherits a chocolate shop from her grandparents but soon finds herself in a battle with a large developer who wants to buy the building to turn it into an exclusive shopping boutique.

programme.title: Holly & Ivy
programme.desc: A contractor helps a woman renovate a house so she can adopt a sick neighbor's two children.

programme.title: Unlocking Christmas
programme.desc: When a mysterious key and a cryptic holiday riddle arrive on their doorsteps, Kate and Kevin embark on a romantic Christmas adventure.

programme.desc: Najjače klupsko takmičenje u košarci na području Evrope svake sezone privlači pažnju velikog broja zaljubljenika košarku. Kao takmičenje visokog kvaliteta verujemo da će privući vašu pažnju. (LIVE).

programme.title: Košarka - Kvalifikacije za EP (ž): Luxembourg - Montenegro
programme.desc: Kvalifikacije za evropsko košarkaško prvenstvo za žene nudi mnogo izjednačenih susreta u borbi za plasman na finalni turnir. Nikako nemojte propustiti ove uzbudljive košarkaške dvoboje!

programme.title: LoL - Worlds: League of Legends - Worlds 2024
programme.desc: Najbolji gejmeri na jednom mestu. Sve što su vežbali godinama, treba da pokažu i primene u praksi sada.

programme.title: Američki koledž fudbal: Memphis - Rice
programme.desc: Koledž fudbal je američki fudbal koji igraju timovi sportista-studenata u okviru američkih koledža, univerziteta i vojnih akademija. Univerzitetski fudbal je jedna stepenica niže u odnosu na... (LIVE).

programme.title: Boks: Beograd - 3. memorijal Miroslav Popović
programme.desc: Boks je sport koji nazivaju plemenitom veštinom, to je borilačka veština koja je popularna vekovima unazad, dok su se prva pravila boksa pojavila u 18. veku.

programme.title: Magazin saudijske lige
programme.desc: Donosimo pregled mečeva saudijske fudbalske lige, najbolji golovi, potezi i analize.

programme.title: Košarka - Australijska liga: Melbourne - Perth
programme.desc: Nema boljeg načina da se počne dan nego uz australijsku košarku. Uzeli su medalju na Olimpijskim igrama, hale su pune i napreduju iz godine u godinu. (LIVE).

programme.title: Trans World Sport (1958)
programme.desc: Interesantne priče i neobični sportovi iz svih delova sveta. Uvek ćete biti u toku uz ovu emisiju.

programme.title: Fudbal - Makedonska liga: Vardar - Škupi
programme.desc: Prva fudbalska liga Severne Makedonije se igra od 1992 . godine kad je prvo izdanje brojalo čak 18 prvoligaša. Kroz godine se broj klubova u elitnom takmičenju smanjio na 10 i danas svaki klub igra... (LIVE).

programme.title: Clubland
programme.desc: Priče o najvećim fudbalskim klubovima na svetu, o tome kako su postali veliki, broju trofeja i pobeda i kako nameravaju da ostanu u evropskom i svetskom vrhu.

programme.title: Fudbal - Bundesliga: St. Pauli - Bayern
programme.desc: Fudbalska Bundesliga najviši je rang takmičenje u Nemačkoj koja od 1963. godine i svog osnutka visokom kvalitetom igre oduševljava sve fudbalske poklonike širom sveta. (LIVE).

programme.title: Ekstremni svet sporta (
programme.desc: Sve o ekstremnim sportovima, takmičenjima u izdržljivosti i istinskim takmičarskim maratonima. Ovi ljudi svaki dan pomeraju granice onoga što je moguće.

programme.title: Košarka - Španska liga: Andorra - Murcia
programme.desc: Španska košarkaška ACB liga osnovana je 1957. godine kao "Liga National". U ligi sudeluje 18 ekipa prema dvokružnom sistemu takmičenja. (LIVE).

programme.title: Pregled Evrolige
programme.desc: 18 najboljih timova Evrope ponovo se bore za titulu najboljeg na kontinentu. EFES je zasluženo uzeo titulu prošle sezone, a čini se da će imati nikada teži zadatak da je odbrane. Mogu li Zvezda i...

programme.title: Fudbal - Švajcarska liga: Servette - Zurich
programme.desc: Švajcarska Super liga pod tim nazivom se vodi od 2003. godine, dok je prvi prvak okrunjen davne 1898. Prvi prvak i najuspješniji klub sa čak 27 titule je Grasshopper Club Zürich. (LIVE).

programme.title: SK Momenti
programme.desc: Suze, znoj i smeh, sve je to sastavni deo sporta. A najbolji sport je uvek bio i uvek će biti na najboljem klubu...

programme.title: Košarka - Euroleague: Panathinaikos - Olympiacos
programme.desc: Najjače klupsko takmičenje u košarci na području Evrope svake sezone privlači pažnju velikog broja zaljubljenika košarku. Kao takmičenje visokog kvaliteta verujemo da će privući vašu pažnju.

programme.title: Odbojka - Italijanska liga (ž): Novara - Perugia
programme.desc: Kao i kod muške odbojkaške lige u Italiji, ženska odbojkaška liga se smatra jednom od najkvalitetnijih takmičenja na svetu. Pravi ljubitelji odbojke sigurno neće propustiti ovo takmičenje!

programme.title: Košarka - Eurocup: Bahcesehir - Hapoel Tel Aviv
programme.desc: Drugo po težini takmičenje u evropskoj klubskoj košarci sigurno zavređuje pažnju ljubitelja košarke. Iako je pomalo u senci Evrolige, Evrokup nudi obilje iznenađenja i kvalitetne košarke.

programme.title: Uži izbor
programme.desc: Najbolji sportisti svih vremena, iz svih sportova. Na istom mestu, u isto vreme, kako ih uporediti i kako napraviti večne liste. Neko će probati ono o čemu se decenijama priča...

programme.title: Rukomet - Mađarska liga (Ž): Esztergom - Ferencvaros
programme.desc: Žensko, rukometno prvenstvo Mađarske je takmičenje koje okuplja najbolje, profesionalne ekipe ove zemlje. Takmičenje se održava u organizaciji Mađarskog rukometnog saveza.

programme.title: Fudbal: LŠ Azije - TWO: Sydney - Hiroshima
programme.desc: Što je Liga Evrope nama, to je AFC Champions League Two na najvećem kontinentu. Ima ovde mnogo kvalitetnih igrača i mnogo onih za koje ste se pitali "gde su i šta rade"...

programme.title: Fudbal - Bugarska liga: Septemvri - Botev Plovdiv
programme.desc: Od 1948. godine bugarski klubovi bore se za titulu najboljeg u zemlji. Trenutno u ligi nastupa 14 klubova, koji se bore za prvo mesto i nastup u kvalifikacijama Lige šampiona.
